segment.source: Results for the Edge Security Software Impact assessment
segment.target: Results for the Edge Security Software Impact assessment

segment.source: Results for the Edge Security Software Impact assessment
segment.target: Results for the Edge Security Software Impact assessment

segment.source: Results for the Edge Security Software Impact assessment
segment.target: Results for the Edge Security Software Impact assessment

segment.source: Applies To: Windows 10
segment.target: Applies To: Windows 10

segment.source: The Edge Security Software Impact assessment measure aspects of Microsoft Edge that are typically impacted by antimalware.
segment.target: The Edge Security Software Impact assessment measure aspects of Microsoft Edge that are typically impacted by antimalware.

segment.source: The assessment measures the impact on the launch and navigate times of Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: The assessment measures the impact on the launch and navigate times of Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: This topic helps you interpret the results produced by the Edge Security Software Impact assessment.
segment.target: This topic helps you interpret the results produced by the Edge Security Software Impact assessment.

segment.source: In this topic:
segment.target: In this topic:

segment.source: Metrics
segment.target: Metrics

segment.source: Issues
segment.target: Issues

segment.source: Metrics
segment.target: Metrics

segment.source: The following metrics are reported by the Edge Security Software Impact assessment.
segment.target: The following metrics are reported by the Edge Security Software Impact assessment.

segment.source: Metric
segment.target: Metric

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Edge Launch and Navigate
segment.target: Edge Launch and Navigate

segment.source: Time in milliseconds for the Microsoft Edge application to launch and have the requested URL available.
segment.target: Time in milliseconds for the Microsoft Edge application to launch and have the requested URL available.

segment.source: App Activate
segment.target: App Activate

segment.source: Time in milliseconds for the Microsoft Edge application to activate.
segment.target: Time in milliseconds for the Microsoft Edge application to activate.

segment.source: Tab Create
segment.target: Tab Create

segment.source: Time in milliseconds for the tab to create in Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: Time in milliseconds for the tab to create in Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: Page Available
segment.target: Page Available

segment.source: Time in milliseconds for the page to be visible to the user.
segment.target: Time in milliseconds for the page to be visible to the user.

segment.source: After Page Available Completion of Page Load
segment.target: After Page Available Completion of Page Load

segment.source: Time in milliseconds for the page to be completely loaded after the page was visible.
segment.target: Time in milliseconds for the page to be completely loaded after the page was visible.

segment.source: Only present if the page was available before it was completely loaded.
segment.target: Only present if the page was available before it was completely loaded.

segment.source: Issues
segment.target: Issues

segment.source: A recommended approach to identifying the sources of performance issues is to follow the model documented in Windows Assessment Toolkit Usage and best practices that involves collecting results from a "baseline" system with a retail Windows image and comparing to results collected from a ‘test’ system with a customized Windows image that contains the relevant extensions and add-on software.
segment.target: A recommended approach to identifying the sources of performance issues is to follow the model documented in Windows Assessment Toolkit Usage and best practices that involves collecting results from a "baseline" system with a retail Windows image and comparing to results collected from a ‘test’ system with a customized Windows image that contains the relevant extensions and add-on software.

segment.source: The assessment results for the two configurations can be compared side by side in the Windows Assessment Console (WAC) to identify the metrics with the largest differences.
segment.target: The assessment results for the two configurations can be compared side by side in the Windows Assessment Console (WAC) to identify the metrics with the largest differences.

segment.source: Clicking on the links to the ETW traces displayed in WAC will display the corresponding performance trace in Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).
segment.target: Clicking on the links to the ETW traces displayed in WAC will display the corresponding performance trace in Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA).

segment.source: WPA can be used to drill down into the CPU and disk utilization of each configuration and similarly comparing the two configurations side by side will help identify the processes that are showing the largest deltas in their use of the CPU and disk.
segment.target: WPA can be used to drill down into the CPU and disk utilization of each configuration and similarly comparing the two configurations side by side will help identify the processes that are showing the largest deltas in their use of the CPU and disk.
